title: BACnetSetClientDeviceFixAddress (Function)
text:
FUNCTION BACnetSetClientDeviceFixAddress :
IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Registers a fix MAC address for communication with the advanced BACnet client API.
The user application can register a fix MAC address for communication to an remote
BACnet device instead of using dynamic address binding which is the default for this API.

rows.Name: devId
rows.Comment:
The device instance number for which a fix MAC address shall
be registered.

rows:
A pointer to a valid MAC address structure which contains the network address under
which the given device instance number is reachable. To go back to dynamic address
binding this parameter shall be NULL.
